item.title: What are all the possible response errors I can get when using license()?
item.dc:creator: jorjeoliveira
item.description:
I want to handle all types of errors from responses when checking licenses.

I basically just need to know 3 main errors output, when the license time expired, invalid hwid, key does not exist.

Iâ€™m trying to do something like that:

keyauth.py, def license(self, key, hwid=None)


if not json["success"]:
            if json["message"] == "Time expired":
                self.__load_user_data({"expired": True, "invalid": False, "hwid": False}, True)
            if json["message"] == "Invalid HWID":
                self.__load_user_data({"expired": False, "invalid": False, "hwid": True}, True)
            if json["message"] == "No key found":
                self.__load_user_data({"expired": False, "invalid": True, "hwid": False}, True)

Read full topic
item.source: What are all the possible response errors I can get when using license()?
